courses.note: No articulation agreement found for SPAN201.

courses.subject: GE
courses.customDesc: One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, B1, B2, B4, Upper-Division B, C1, Lower-Division C, D1, D2, Upper-Division D, Lower-Division E, F, and GE Elective. Upper-Division B and Upper-Division D should be taken only after Junior standing is reached (90 units). Refer to online catalog for GE course selection, United States Cultural Pluralism (USCP) and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR). USCP requirement can be satisfied by some (but not all) courses within GE categories: Upper-Division B, C1, Upper-Division C, D1, Upper-Division D, or E.

courses.subject: Free Elective
courses.customDesc:
Any Free Elective course can go here.

Minimum 20 units of free electives. If upper-division GE courses are used to satisfy Major requirements, additional upper-division coursework may be required to satisfy the University's 60-units upper-division requirement.

courses.subject: Minor Course
courses.customDesc:
Any Minor course can go here.

Students may not declare a Spanish minor. Courses in a minor may not be used to satisfy Major requirements or Approved Electives in BA Spanish (no double counting of coursework).
